```{r}
data = read.csv(file = "~/SIVIOgit/CPE study/SIVIO_CPE_Jan_11_22.csv")

num_respondents = data %>%
  unique(Respondent.ID) %>%
  nrow()

names(data)
```

```{r}
data %>% 
  group_by(Respondent.s.gender, Did.you.vote.in.the.last.general.elections) %>%
  summarise(n=n()) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Respondent.s.gender, y = n, fill = Did.you.vote.in.the.last.general.elections, )) +
  geom_col(position = position_dodge())
```
